game_description: Virtual Disaster is a game in which you play as a giant that watches over and protects a city from destruction. Disasters will strike in increasingly difficult waves of unfortunate events, including: * Meteors - Defend with baseball bats * Buildings on fire - Extinguish with rain clouds * Zombie attack - Fry with a magnifying glass or two * Alien invasion - Catch and throw flying saucers How long will your city survive?
